title: [Game Mode Idea] The Hunt

replies.body: Wait, Nemesis Draft gave you skins?
You could purchase a battle boost using RP to get a bonus of 200IP (100IP for team mates) and unlock all skins (for entire team) for the champ you got for one game.
I have no idea what you're talking about lol. I don't play any of the "party" mode games. I haven't even played U.R.F before.

TT doesn't seem large enough for an effective 5v5. Just take a look at what happened with Hexakill: TT, it was overcrowded. Perhaps the Crystal Scar would be better, after all Hide and Seek is played there quite effectively.
